data.Sentence_cn: 美国探险家 R.E.伯德在飞越北极3年之后，于1929年第一次飞越了南极。
data.Sentence: In 1929, three years after his flight over the North Pole, the American explorer, R.E.Byrd,successfully flew over the South Pole for the first time.

data.Sentence_cn: 虽然开始时伯德和他的助手们拍下了飞机下面连绵群山的大量照片，
data.Sentence: Though, at first, Byrd and his men were able to take a great many photographs of the mountains that lay below,

data.Sentence_cn: 但他们很快就陷入了困境。
data.Sentence: they soon ran into serious trouble.

data.Sentence_cn: 在有个地方，飞机似乎肯定要坠毁了。
data.Sentence: At one point, it seemed certain that their plane would crash.

data.Sentence_cn: 只有在飞至10,000英尺的高度时，它才能飞过这些山头。
data.Sentence: It could only get over the mountains if it rose to 10,000 feet.

data.Sentence_cn: 伯德马上命令他的助手们把两个沉重的食物袋扔掉，
data.Sentence: Byrd at once ordered his men to throw out two heavy food sacks.

data.Sentence_cn: 于是飞机可以上升了，它在离山头400英尺的高度飞越了过去。
data.Sentence: The plane was then able to rise and it cleared the mountains by 400 feet.

data.Sentence_cn: 伯德这时知道他能够顺利飞抵300英里以外的南极了，
data.Sentence: Byrd now knew that he would be able to reach the South Pole which was 300 miles away,
for there were no more mountains in sight.

data.Sentence_cn: 飞机可以毫无困难地飞过这片茫茫无际的白色原野！
data.Sentence: The aircraft was able to fly over the endless white plains without difficulty.
